skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

skillTree.name: Chaos Warshrine
skillTree.description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

effects.description: Mount: Warshrine

skillTree.name: Devious Tempter
skillTree.description: A handsome hero is sure to tempt many, drawing the unwitting into the Prince of Pleasure's fold.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: -1
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: +1
	(Hero's army)

Khorne Authority: -2
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: +2
	(Hero's army)

Khorne Authority: -3
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: +3
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Smoke & Mirrors"

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Spell: "The Enfeebling Foe"
Overcast spell: "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Enfeebling Foe"
Overcast spell: "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Spell: "The Withering"
Overcast spell: "The Withering Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Withering"
Overcast spell: "The Withering Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Spell: "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Overcast spell: "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Overcast spell: "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Evasion"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Spell: "Pit of Shades"
Overcast spell: "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Pit of Shades"
Overcast spell: "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Spell: "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Overcast spell: "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Overcast spell: "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.name: Warrior Wizard
skillTree.description: "Robes? Fool! We're going to battle, not a ball. Hand me my armour! ARMOUR!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +5
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Spellslinger
skillTree.description: Spell after spell, grant the enemy no reprieve!

effects.description: Cooldown: -15% to spells

skillTree.name: Unmoving Mage
skillTree.description: Magic is little threat to one so well-versed in its dark and terrible intricacies.

effects.description: Hit points: +6%
Spell resistance: 10%
Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Slaanesh Soul Feeder
skillTree.description: When the energies of life are draining from the body, another's life energy will surely staunch the flow.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Soul Feeder"

skillTree.name: Alluring Energy
skillTree.description: Victims can only stop and stare as the wickedly beautiful hordes charge them down.

effects.description:
Speed: +5%
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +5
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Beautiful Destruction
skillTree.description: There's a dark and haunting beauty about such devastating impact, as bodies fall helplessly in tandem.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Lesser Doombolt"

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description:
Slaanesh corruption: +1
	(local province)
Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 1

Slaanesh corruption: +2
	(local province)
Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 2

Slaanesh corruption: +3
	(local province)
Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -10%
Hero action success chance: +1%
Hero action cost: -20%
Hero action success chance: +3%
Hero action cost: -40%
Hero action success chance: +6%

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

Undivided Authority: +1
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Burning Body
backgroundSkills.description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

effects.description: Enables flaming attacks
Fire resistance: 50%

backgroundSkills.name: Chaos Familiar
backgroundSkills.description: A Chaos Familiar memorises spells on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.

effects.description: Cooldown: -5% to all spells

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Fury
backgroundSkills.description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25%
Charge bonus: +35

backgroundSkills.name: Evil Eyeball
backgroundSkills.description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25%

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Hideous Visage
backgroundSkills.description: The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

effects.description:
Control: -8
	(local enemy province)
Attribute: Causes Fear

backgroundSkills.name: Iron Skin
backgroundSkills.description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.

effects.description: Armour: +25
Unit mass: +25%

backgroundSkills.name: Scaled Skin
backgroundSkills.description: The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 25%
Physical resistance: 5%

backgroundSkills.name: Opened Eyes
backgroundSkills.description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description: Character experience gain: +15%

backgroundSkills.name: Unearthly Reflexes
backgroundSkills.description: A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.

effects.description: Speed: +15%
Melee defence: +8
